name: Alien Invaders: Shoot'em Up
description:
Welcome everyone! This game is actually a gift for Makhor and a submission for Secret Santa Jam held on itch.io! Thanks a lot to Makhor for liking and playing my game (aka the gift), and as he/she said, I have kept the game public for everyone to see and try it out :)

Objective of the Game :

Protect your side using your spaceship from the aliens that are invading your planet!

KEYBOARD W / UP ARROW KEY : Move Up
KEYBOARD S / DOWN ARROW KEY : Move Down

SPACE / LEFT-CLICK : Primary Shoot (Weapon 1)
CTRL / RIGHT-CLICK : Secondary Shoot (Weapon 2)
ALT / MIDDLE-CLICK : Missile Launch (Weapon 3)

TAB / KEYBOARD F : Activate Laser Shield

**Recommended Control** : Use W and S for moving the spaceship and LEFT-CLICK and RIGHT-CLICK for Primary and Secondary Shoot respectively, use ALT for Missile Launch and TAB for Activating the Shield.

CREDITS :

Game Developed for : Makhor (in Secret Santa Jam on itch.io)
Game Developed by : Vaibhav Kumar (@vaibhavkr on itch.io)

Alien Assets from : Kenney
Main Music from : Alexandr Zhelanov (https://soundcloud.com/alexandr-zhelanov)
Sound Effects from : rubberduck (https://opengameart.org/users/rubberduck)
Button Clicked Sound from : zapsplat.com

Mouse Pointer Image from : OpenClipart-Vectors (pixabay.com)
Font Used : Agency FB

Spaceship 1 from : succo (pixabay.com)
Spaceship 2 from : 588ku (https://pngtree.com/)
Spaceship 3 from : 588ku (https://pngtree.com/)

Map 1 from : Aetherna (www.ifu.deviantart.com)
Map 3 from : ansimuz (https://ansimuz.itch.io/space-background)
Map 4 from : AVADA (https://pngtree.com/)
Map 5 from : erikahuertas13 (openclipart.org)
Map 6 from : Free-Photos (pixabay.com)

Heart/Life Icon from : Asher (findicons.com)

Bullets from : Master484 (http://m484games.ucoz.com/)

Game Buttons from : TheInvisibleMen (https://pngtree.com/)
Music Button from : 588ku (https://pngtree.com/)

Gift Ribbon from : SJyezhen (https://pngtree.com/)
Logo and Additional Buttons designed from Vaibhav Kumar (using MS PowerPoint)

Additional Assets from : Kenney

Note : If you are downloading for Windows and don't have an Open-GL Graphics Card or having any other issue using the normal/standard version of the game, you can try out the Electron version of the game, it should work but may work slowly and may take up more space/memory than normal/standard version. For Linux (untested), just extract the zip file and run AlienInvaders.x86_64 or AlienInvaders.x86 file on your Linux machine. If you are having any issues, just do comment below, but the online HTML5 version should probably work in each desktop system having a GUI interface :)

Thanks everyone for playing! :)
